title: Britain Toughens Stance on Russia, as Russia Presses NATO for Assurances - The New York Times
content: Britain Toughens Stance on Russia, as Russia Presses NATO for Assurances  The New York TimesView Full Coverage on Google News
description: Britain moved to broaden the range of sanctions available if Russia invades Ukraine, as Moscow sent an “urgent demand” to NATO to clarify its stance.
